name: MarinHealth Medical Center
description: MarinHealth (Formerly known as Marin General Hospital) is a full-service, not for profit hospital. Medical coverage is available for low-income, uninsured patients. The hospital offers advanced medical expertise, technology, and treatments in an exceptionally healing environment.
fullDescription: MarinHealth (Formerly known as Marin General Hospital) is a full-service, not for profit hospital. Medical coverage is available for low-income, uninsured patients. The hospital offers advanced medical expertise, technology, and treatments in an exceptionally healing environment.
